description: Detoxifying scalp treatmentIdeal as a pre-shampoo ritualCleans the scalpStimulates the hair life cycleRestores optimal conditionsEnriched with Eucalyptus essential oils
cleaned_text: Impure and stressed scalps require an intensive detoxifying treatment to restore their normal balance. Aroma Treatment is a detox treatment that acts as a skin purifier ideal for the scalp to be applied before the normal beauty ritual. It is able to restore optimal conditions and promote the life cycle of the hair. The sensation on the skin is that of extremely relaxing pampering. The skin on the scalp is purified and pleasantly refreshed, ready for the next treatment steps. Thanks to the natural essential oils of Eucalyptus, Bergamot and Orange, the formula has an astringent, antiseptic and disinfectant action on the skin. In addition, it releases a pleasant fresh citrusy scent that will contribute to the relaxing atmosphere that accompanies the entire treatment.
